mapper.sql: owner_id, owner_type, owner_name, owner_sex, owner_birth, owner_nation, owner_education, owner_notype, owner_no, owner_work, owner_phone, urgent_name, urgent_phone,family_count,house_count
mapper.select:
select
from t_owner where owner_name like #{value} or urgent_name like #{value} order by owner_id desc
mapper.update:
update t_owner
owner_type = #{ownerType,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_name = #{ownerName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_sex = #{ownerSex,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_birth = #{ownerBirth,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
owner_nation = #{ownerNation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_education = #{ownerEducation,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_notype = #{ownerNotype,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_no = #{ownerNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_work = #{ownerWork,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
owner_phone = #{ownerPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_name = #{urgentName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
urgent_phone = #{urgentPhone,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
family_count = #{familyCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
house_count = #{houseCount,jdbcType=INTEGER},
where owner_id = #{ownerId,jdbcType=INTEGER}
